title: Echo
description: Painfully shy due to a speech condition, Cole Heath has always had a hard time connecting to people outside of his family. So when he meets Anderson Bester for the first time, he doesn't really think anything of it. He certainly doesn't imagine that he'll end up falling in love.This edition is just the hit novella "Echo" by itself."Echo" is part of "The Brownstone Diaries."
author: Sol Crafter
